abstract: China’s leader pledged to cut food costs, tackle property prices, punish graft and address the wealth gap.
snippet: China’s leader pledged to cut food costs, tackle property prices, punish graft and address the wealth gap.
lead_paragraph: Premier Wen Jiabao reduced China’s economic growth goals and said that the government would focus on ensuring the benefits of expansion were more evenly distributed.

headline.main: China Reduces Growth Goal and Vows to Curb Inequities
headline.print_headline: In China, a Pledge to Curb Inequity

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
